files.name: main.py
files.content:
#Ferris Alex - Mid Term Program

print ('Planet Express Delivery Time Calculator')

planetName = input("What is the name of the planet?")

distance = input('How many parsecs away?')
distance = float( distance )

numberofPackages = input('How many packages?')
numberofPackages = float( numberofPackages )

tons = input('How many tons does each package weigh?')
tons = float( tons )

#Error checks
if( numberofPackages < 1):
    print( 'Error: The ship must carry at least one package.' )

elif( tons <= 0 ):
    print( 'Error: The package weight', tons, 'is too light.' )
    
elif( distance < 1 ):
    print( 'Error:', planetName, ' must be one or more parsecs away.' )
    
    Output = ( numberofPackages % 2 )
elif( (numberofPackages > 10) and (not( Output == 0 )) ):
    numberofPackages = numberofPackages + 1
    print( "Warning: Adjusting package count to", numberofPackages )

#The Calculations

else:
    print()
    totalWeight = ( tons * numberofPackages )
    print( 'The total cargo weight is', totalWeight, ' ton(s).')
    
    slowDown = ( totalWeight * distance )
    minutestoPlanet = ( distance + slowDown )
    print( 'The trip to' ,planetName, ' will take' ,minutestoPlanet,' minutes.')
    
    print( 'The trip back to Earth will take' ,distance, 'minutes.')
    
    totalTime = ( distance + minutestoPlanet )
    print ( 'The total trip time is', totalTime )

    if( planetName == 'Robot Planet'):
        print( 'Also, Bender is great!' )
